cards.text: The physical parts of a computer that you can touch and feel are known as _______.
Output unit allows users to enter data and give instructions to the processing unit. (True/False)
Light pen is an example of an Input unit. (True/False)
The 3 main parts of a CPU are Control Unit, Arithmetic and Logic Unit & _______.
cards.tip: Holds data temporarily or permanently

cards.text: The unit of CPU which performs arithmetical and logical operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication and division is:(write in full form)
cards.answer: Arithmetic Logical Unit \/ ALU\/ Arithmetic and logic unit
cards.tip: Computation unit of a Computer

cards.text: The information such as text, pictures, video and sound displayed on the monitor is called a _______ output.
The 2 types of memory are _______ & Secondary memory.
Primary memory is very cheap compared to Secondary memory. (True/False)
DVD stands for Digital Versatile Disc. (True/False)
The smallest unit of memory is called _______.

description: Answer according to the Texts and Images provided in the cards.
